Description: Grouping columns for the box plot
Toggle box visibility
Toggle box divider visibility
Hex color string for the vertical line between groups
Line style for the box divider lines {‘-’, ‘--’, ‘-.’, ‘:’}
Width of the divider lines in pixels
Hex color string for the edge of the box
Width of the edge of the boxes in pixels
Hex color string of the bar fill
Hex color string of the median line inside each box
Toggle the horizontal lines showing the min/max of the data range
Hex color string for the box range lines
Line style for the box range lines {‘-’, ‘--’, ‘-.’, ‘:’}
Width of the range lines in pixels
Toggle range lines that extend from the box Q1/Q3 edges to the data min/max
Hex color string for the box whisker lines
Line style for the box whisker lines {‘-’, ‘--’, ‘-.’, ‘:’}
Width of the whisker lines in pixels
Set the fractional width of the boxes between 0-1
Use a notched-style box instead of a rectangular box
